accuracy.description: Correctness of the solution provided, comparing it to the expected answer.

conciseness.description: The brevity of the solution, focusing on whether the steps are clear and concise, without unnecessary information or calculations.

step_clarity.description: How clear and well-explained each step of the solution is.

notation.description: Appropriate usage of mathematical notation, including symbols and expressions.

response_time.description: Time taken to provide the solution from the initial problem input.
